versiculos: 1. Blessed is every one that fears the LORD; that walks in his ways.
2. For you shall eat the labour of yours hands: happy shall you be, and it shall be well with you.
3. Your wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of yours house: your children like olive plants round about your table.
4. Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that fears the LORD.
5. The LORD shall bless you out of Zion: and you shall see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life.
6. Yea, you shall see your children's children, and peace upon Israel.
